item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent, leave the house before you find something worth staying in for. " -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "You're mind is working at its best when you're being paranoid. You explore every avenue and possibility of your situation at high speed with total clarity." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description:
"The human race is the most stupid and unfair kind of race. A lot of the runners don't even get decent sneakers or clean drinking water.
Some runners are born with a massive head start, every possible help along the way and still the referees seem to be on their side.
It's not surprising a lot of people have given up compeating altogether and gone to sit in the grandstand, eat junk and shout abuse.
What the human race needs is a lot more streakers." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "Some people become cops because they want to make the world a better place. Some people become vandals because they want to make the world a better looking place." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "A lot of mothers will do anything for their children, except let them be themselves." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "There are four basic human needs; food, sleep, sex and revenge." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "A lot of people never use their initiative because no-one told them to." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "All artists are willing to suffer for their work. But why are so few prepared to learn to draw?" -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "There's nothing more dangerous than someone who wants to make the world a better place." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "The thing I hate the most about advertising is that it attracts all the bright, creative and ambitious young people, leaving us mainly with the slow and self-obsessed to become our artists.. Modern art is a disaster area. Never in the field of human history has so much been used by so many to say so little." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "I need someone to protect me from all the measures they take in order to protect me. " -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "If you want to say something and have people listen then you have to wear a mask. If you want to be honest then you have to live a lie." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "People either love me or they hate me, or they don't really care." -- Banksy

item.title: Lalucybird add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "People who get up early in the morning cause war, death and famine." -- Banksy
